items.description:
Empire Glassworks is known for their remarkable detail work, and their "Under the Sea" mini rig is no exception.  Adorned with a friendly underwater scene complete with clown fish, coral, starfish, a turtle, and an octopus. Complete with a 14.5mm female joint to a fixed percolated downstem. A matching  green slyme octopus flower bowl. The attention to detail on this piece will make it a staple in your collection.

 
Fan of Empire Glassworks? Check out our American Artist Series interview with Phil, the CEO of Empire.
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Under the Sea" Coral Reef Mini Rig

items.description: Who wouldn't want a sea turtle shaped one hitter pendant? This little guy is great for on-the-go use and fits virtually anywhere!
items.title: Under the Sea Turtle Pendant

items.description: This sea-life themed spoon was handcrafted by the experts at Empire Glassworks. Empire is renowned for creating incredibly detailed glass art, and the "Under The Sea" spoon is a testament to their skill. This dry pipe is adorned with a mighty octopus and colorful coral accents. Every single component of this pipe was hand fired in Placentia CA. This pipe is sure to be suction cupped to your hands!
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Under The Sea" Spoon

items.description: This hand pipe by Empire Glassworks, features a beautifully worked spoon body with themed ocean critters throughout the piece.  A must have for any true sea lovers.
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Under the Sea" Spoon Pipe

items.description:
Take a dive with this colorful sitting sherlock.

 
If you're looking for a lively new piece to add to your collection, this "Yellow Tang Fish" sitting sherlock from Harley Morales will have you craving both your dry herbs and a fresh platter of sushi.  This sherlock sits on a yellow base, which supports the pink slyme sherlock itself as well as three tendrils of purple pillar coral, green waves of seaweed, yellow staghorn coral, a dichroic black soft coral, and a tower of colorful hard corals all home to two unassuming yellow tang fish.  This piece is perfect for any sea-lover or aquarium enthusiast, and looks beautiful even alone on a shelf or side table.
items.title: Harley Morales Sea-Themed "Yellow Tang Fish" Sitting Sherlock

items.description:
Make a scuba adventure out of your next sesh.

 
If you've ever wanted to chill with a school of barracuda (and who hasn't?) you'll want to check out this sitting sherlock from Harley Morales.  With a yellow base, pink slyme pillar coral, a dichroic hard coral accent, and a colorful arrangement of yellow and red staghorn corals, you'll forget all about your life above the sea after a few puffs out of this pipe.
items.title: Harley Morales Sea-Themed "Barracuda Friends" Sitting Sherlock

items.description:
Ahoy Matey!

 
This complete set contains absolutely everything you need to upgrade your set up! Empire has really outdone themselves this time, providing this incredibly detailed water pipe with sea themed glass decorations. From coral and fish to a Kraken swallowing a sail ship, this piece has it all! Also included with this set is a matching flower bowl to keep the theme going.
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Under The Sea" Water Pipe

items.description:
Bring the beach to your rig!

 
Add this drop down, from Empire Glassworks, to avoid damaging your favorite rig and add some oceanside flair. Uses 14.5mm ground joints made to fit both female and male joints. This a great way to personalize a traditional pipe. Make sure to pick yours up today.

 
 Made in Placentia, CA
 Hand Mixed Custom Colors
 Ocean Life Themed Glass Work 🐠 🐢
 Collectible!!
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Under the Sea" Male to Female Drop Down Adapter

items.description:
Take a daytime trip to the beach in the comfort of your own home with this beautiful mini tube.

 
Imagine if the girl who sold seashells by the seashore sold water pipes instead - this would be one of those pipes. Handmade in Asheville, North Carolina, this medium-sized tube is perfect for the lover of sandy beaches and relaxation. The seashell accent was created with a hand-dremeled graphite mold for the glass, and the blue worked neck is a lovely accent to this simple heady piece. With the 14.5mm male taster bowl you can load this beauty up and pull your smoke through the simple but efficient multi-hole downstem. With minimal yet satisfying percolation, this piece could be perfect for a rig as well - just switch out the bowl with a quartz banger or ceramic nail and you're good to go!

 
Don't let this piece float away from you with the tide - grab one today!
items.title: Deranged Lion "Seashell" Mini Tube with Seashell Accent and Worked Neck

items.description: Dive into this dome presented by Empire Glassworks! This dome features glass bubbles, kelp, a sea star, and clown fish swimming around. Perfect for any Sea Lover's collection!
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Sandy Shores" Female Dome

items.description:
It came from the deep...to smoke you out.

 
This tentacle is not here to drag you to the depths. Instead, it is here to elevate your next smoke break. A tribute to your life on the high seas battling raging storms and sea monsters. Each pipe is worked from various colors for an uncanny look. The finishing touch is the glass suckers lining the top. A great pipe for sea lovers. Orders yours today.
items.title: "Tako" 🐙 Tentacle Themed Hand Pipe

items.description: Diversify your nail set up with these awesome quartz bangers, adorned with your favorite decorative banger cap! Pick from a number of different characters and creatures, meticulously crafted by Empire Glassworks.
items.title: Empire Glassworks Quartz Banger With Decorative Cap

items.description: This piece will surely add some flair to your bowl collection. The Sandy Shores Female Flower Bowl come to you from Empire Glassworks and features and under-the-sea theme adorned with fish, starfish, and aquatic plants!
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Sandy Shores" Female Flower Bowl

items.description: Find yourself dreaming of the Sea side? This piece from Empire Glassworks showcases an array of Ocean Life, all in one perc! The glass is beautifully made, from the black wrapped lip and base to the detailed octopus perc. You are able to see clown fish, kelp, sea stars, and anemones, all featured within this one water pipe. A vapor dome and screened bowl are included!
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Ocean Critters" Water Pipe

items.description: These Seashell spoon pipe from Empire Glassworks are worked with hand mixed glass and are breathtakingly beautiful. With a left handed carb and a comfortable design, this piece fits well in the palm of your hand and is the perfect fit for any mermaid in the five oceans.  Buy this hand pipe today and be the envy of every collection under the sea (and on land)!
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Seashell" Spoon

items.description: If you're looking for a new bowl with a new kind of style, check out this pufferfish bowl from Empire Glassworks. This male bowl wears a 14.5mm joint and a deep, ridged bowl for ensuring maximum efficiency from your dry herbs. Even the little spines on the pufferfish himself make this bowl feel all the more alive. With this flower bowl, you can take your next smoking sesh down low to sea levels with style and good humor.
items.title: Empire Glassworks Green Pufferfish Male Flower Bowl

items.description: Blown by the amazingly talented Becky Feathers, this adorable little guy is one of her Mouthebreather series. The red tongue inside its mouth is actually a diffused downstem and since the mouth is made with clear glass you can watch the percolation happening! The rest of the body is made from Sea Foam Green glass, and the piece has black accented horns and toes, as well as elongated elf ears that make him irresistibly cute! It ships with a matching colored vapor slide.
items.title: BFF Glass Seafoam Mouthbreather Rig

items.description:
Have your Next Sesh with the Creatures of the Sea!

 
 
This mini recycler from Empire Glassworks, is guaranteed to bring the fun to to your next sesh. The Mini Beehive Recycler has features for you. The 3-hole downstem pushes out bubbles as the water flows to the top chamber and cycles back down, cooling your smoke for the best experience.

 
Classically styled, with an aquatic creatures theme, complete with fish, turtles, and matching flower bowl, and honey drips. All made from hand-mixed colors and quality materials by the team in Placentia, CA. A great pipe for your collection, or if you're looking to for a pipe that's outside the norm. Get yours today!
items.title: Empire Glassworks Eastern Australian Current Mini Recycler

items.description:
Fun Worked Spoon with Curly Legs

 
Since you dream about being a sea dweller, we have come up with a piece just for you. "Tiny Eyes" gets its name from the marbles fixed to the spoon. The pipe is worked to resemble an octopus and has superb airflow. The large size is comfortable to hold in your hand and easy to pass to your buddies. When not in use, you can sit it on its curly legs for an octopus friend to keep you company. Limited quantity available, pick yours out today!
items.title: "Tiny Eyes" Octopus Themed Hand Pipe

items.description:
Incredible diffusion with wild style.

 
Charybdis was once the great sea monster that tormented the Greek sailors on the Strait of Messina, but has now been rationalized as a giant whirlpool.  A fitting name for Sesh Supply's latest water pipe, the "Charybdis" is a whirlpool of a piece, and as an internal recycler it is constantly working to keep your smoke wonderfully diffused and clean as ever.  With the "Charybdis," you can pack your dry herbs into the packaged flower bowl and send them on a wild ride through the propellor perc, and then through the water of the Klein recycler.  If you're a fan of terrifyingly powerful water pipes, you'll definitely want to add the "Charybdis" to your monster collection.

 
Want to see more pipes named after Greek mythological creatures?
items.title: Sesh Supply "Charybdis" Propellor Perc Klein-Style Recycler

items.description: Empire Glassworks will never let you down with one of their octopi, and they especially don't on this mini sea rig. The mouthpiece of this rig is an octopus, and there are fish, coral, starfish, and other sea creatures that can be found on the body, neck, and dome of the piece. This piece features a fixed downstem and has a 14.5mm female joint. Dive into Empire Glassworks and their great glass by starting with one of these.
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Sea Critter" Mini Rig

items.description:
Down by the Sea Shore....

 
This spoon is presented by our wonderful friends at GlasseX! Worked in cobalt glass, this fumed spoon is sure to catch your eye! The pattern on the head of the spoon is worked in a beautiful pale fumed yellow. The Sea Shore Spoon also features a firm dotted hand grip on the opposite side of the carb.
items.title: GlasseX "Sea Shore" Fumed Spoon

items.description:
Up From The Depths!

 
This is a truly unique honey bucket to add to your collection! Empire has done it again with this meticulously adorned accessory. Fish swim through underwater plants around the dome of this nail. Also included is a matching carb cap to ensure that your rig set up is complete!
items.title: Empire Glassworks "Under The Sea" Honey Bucket

items.description: This collaboration piece from Nexus Glass features the classic Nexus Puck design covered in heady glasswork by Phatt Matt. The puck itself has a polished male joint and comes with a polished female dome. On the side of the dome is a small fish detail which can be found on two other glass marbles attached to the side of the puck, too. A heady worked Sea horse, cluster of sea weed, red coral, starfish, and coral worked in green slime are the main focal points of this concentrate pipe, and make it the perfect addition to any ocean lovers collection!
items.title: Nexus Glass and Phatt Matt Under the Sea-horse Collab
